entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Peters Bay
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 6:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 47 %
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: W 25 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 6 except plus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6 except plus 1 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the evening and ending overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
